title: Championship Shyvana
body:
I didn't miss it, did I? I was playing Shyvana recently and I noticed the Championship Shyvana skin said 'click here to buy' but it's not in the store. 

The skin code comes on the day of the final match, right? Or did I miss it? ._.

replies.body: do you have to buy it or will there be a code? please answer!
She is currently for sale for 975 RP.
Will this champ skin be live rivens and never come out again or like thresh and be available next year or three mystery box?

If she is available for a limited time until October 31st, shouldn't she be labeled as "Limited Availability" in the store? 
Only the SKT T1 and TPA skins show up when I check limited availability and uncheck all other filters in the skins store.
Didn't miss it yet, it's more than likely going to be released the day of the final match or maybe some time before for people to buy! But no you didn't miss it!
Oops! You're right. I'll let the store team know! :D

Despite the clipping issues, champsionship shyv looks kind of cool.  

Do want.
